## Format

15+15 mins Presentation + Discussion

## Details

Explain a software design/engineering problem you are facing in your current package work. Slides optional. Suggested presentation structure:

1. **Package Context (1-2 mins)**: Background, motivation, target user, features etc.
2. **Development Challenge(s) (5-7 mins)**: Outline the specific problem/idea you want feedback
